title: Eden Gardens: Cricketing Coliseum
image_instruction: Show footage of cricket matches played at Eden Gardens with fans cheering on.
script: Eden Gardens, along with MCG is considered to be cricket's answer to Coliseum. It has been home to many great matches, including India's famous come-from-behind victory against Australia. The passionate and vocal crowd here makes it an incredible experience for any cricketer. Despite a few incidents of riots and boorish behaviour, Eden Gardens remains one of the most sought-after stadiums in the world. If you're a cricket fan, Eden Gardens is a must-visit place.
